items.title: AI to accelerate national renewal and growth as Google DeepMind backs UK tech and science sectors
items.summary: A new partnership with Google DeepMind will help to turn cutting-edge AI into real benefits for working people.

items.title: Guidance: Taking part in the UK Emissions Trading Scheme markets
items.summary: This guidance explains the operation of the UK ETS markets and how to take part in auctions and in trading on the secondary market.

items.title: Statutory guidance: Reference Documents for The Customs Tariff (Preferential Trade Arrangements) (EU Exit) Regulations 2020
items.summary: Find the UK’s preferential tariffs and Rules of Origin for the agreements contained within the Customs Tariff (Preferential Trade Arrangements and Tariff Quotas) (Amendment) (EU Exit) Regulations 2020.

items.title: Financial support for nuclear lifetime extensions
items.summary: We're seeking views on amending the Contract for Difference (CfD) legislation to enable existing nuclear generating assets to be eligible for CfDs to incentivise investment into lifetime extensions.

items.title: Smart Secure Electricity Systems (SSES) Programme: draft load control licence regulations and conditions
items.summary: We're seeking views on the proposed regulations, including the licence conditions designed to protect consumers and the electricity system.

items.title: Great British Energy backs Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland
items.summary: Great British Energy backs renewable schemes in Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland.

items.title: Guidance: Growth Gateway: UK-Kenya green tech opportunities​
items.summary: Kenya’s cold chain market, projected to reach £130 million to £250 million by 2030, offers UK investors opportunities to reduce food loss, boost exports, and increase sustainable growth.

items.title: Notice: Green Gas Support Scheme: budget management
items.summary: Details of the budget management mechanisms of the Green Gas Support Scheme.

items.title: Notice: Green Gas Support Scheme (GGSS): open to applications
items.summary: This scheme provides tariff support for biomethane produced via anaerobic digestion which is injected into the gas grid.

items.title: Guidance: Growth Gateway: Trade and investment opportunities in North and West African horticulture
items.summary: North West Africa’s horticulture sector offers a £37 billion opportunity in cold chain logistics and financing, with strong growth potential in Nigeria, Ghana and Morocco.

items.title: Guidance: Growth Gateway: Guide to inclusive investing in Africa
items.summary: A practical guide for investors to unlock Africa’s tech potential through inclusive strategies that support women-led and women-centric businesses in high-growth sectors.

items.title: Guidance: Growth Gateway: Mpumalanga economic landscape
items.summary: Mpumalanga’s economy faces a pivotal shift from coal to green and diversified sectors, unlocking high-potential opportunities for SMMEs and investors under South Africa’s Just Energy Transition.

items.title: Guidance: Growth Gateway: ASEAN cooperation on industrial project-based initiatives scoping paper
items.summary: ASEAN’s new framework for industrial project-based cooperation aims to accelerate regional economic integration, create resilient supply chains, and unlock up to 15% GDP growth and 6 million jobs by 2030.

items.title: Guidance: Capture Redress Scheme: legal costs framework
items.summary: This guidance sets out the legal costs the Department for Business and Trade (DBT) will cover for Capture Redress Scheme applicants.

items.title: Extended CE marking recognition for Ecodesign regulations
items.summary: We’re seeking views on a proposal to extend recognition of CE marking for ecodesign regulations so that it applies to new measures made under ESPR.

items.title: Get support from the Information and Support Service
items.summary: The Information and Support Service can support those who do not have legal representation and are applying to redress schemes relating to the Horizon scandal.

items.title: Guidance: Information and Support Service: privacy notice
items.summary: What data is collected when you contact the Information and Support Service - how it’s used, where it’s stored and your rights.

items.title: Accredited official statistics: Weekly road fuel prices
items.summary: Road fuel price statistics providing average UK retail 'pump' prices on a weekly basis.

items.title: Policy paper: Global Clean Power Alliance: finance mission country action plans
items.summary: Country action plans launched at COP30 with the Global Clean Power Alliance (GCPA) finance mission.

items.title: Policy paper: Global Clean Power Alliance: finance mission update (November 2025)
items.summary: This update sets out progress under the Global Clean Power Alliance (GCPA) finance mission at COP30 in Belém.

items.title: Apply for ATI programme funding
items.summary: The Aerospace Technology Institute (ATI) programme co-funds civil aerospace research and technology development in the UK. You must read this guidance before you apply.

items.title: Transparency data: Post Office Capture financial redress data for 2025
items.summary: Data for 2025 on redress for postmasters impacted by the Post Office Capture software.

items.title: Transparency data: Post Office Horizon financial redress and legal costs data for 2025
items.summary: Data for 2025 on redress for postmasters impacted by the Post Office Horizon scandal.

items.title: Oil and gas: environmental submissions and determinations
items.summary: Interested parties can review records of applications and statements submitted to OPRED as required by environmental regulations.

items.title: Oil and gas: offshore environmental legislation
items.summary: Environmental regulations and guidance on offshore oil and gas exploration and production offshore gas unloading and storage and offshore carbon dioxide storage activities

items.title: Warm Home Discount (WHD): cost recovery
items.summary: We are seeking views on whether WHD costs should move from standing charges to the per-unit rate.

items.title: Notice: Contracts for Difference (CfD) Allocation Round 7: statutory notices
items.summary: Final statutory notices required to launch Contracts for Difference Allocation Round 7.

items.title: Amending the ECO4 Order to allow cost recovery via grant funding
items.summary: We are seeking views on making a small change to the Energy Company Obligation (ECO4) Order, to specify which government grants cannot fund the scheme.

items.title: Transparency data: UK Industrial Fusion Solutions prompt payment return data
items.summary: Prompt payment return data for UKIFS, showing invoices paid within 5 and 30 days of receipt.

items.title: Guidance: Capture Redress Scheme: independent panel and panel chair privacy notice
items.summary: How the Capture Redress Scheme independent panel and the panel chair  will process your personal data.

items.title: Government urges the nation to back Britain’s small firms this Small Business Saturday
items.summary: Government calls on public to back Britain's businesses on Small Buisness Saturday

items.title: Notice: Low Carbon Hydrogen Supply 2 competition: successful projects
items.summary: The Low Carbon Hydrogen Supply Competition aimed to provide funding for projects that could help develop a wide range of innovative low-carbon hydrogen supply solutions.

items.title: UK Emissions Trading Scheme: future markets policy
items.summary: The UK ETS Authority is seeking views on the development of UK Emissions Trading Scheme markets policies.

items.title: Extending the UK Emissions Trading Scheme cap beyond 2030
items.summary: We're seeking views on extending the UK Emissions Trading Scheme beyond the end of Phase I.

items.title: Small business access to finance
items.summary: This call for evidence seeks views, evidence and experiences of applying for and accessing debt finance in the UK for small businesses.

items.title: Guidance: Horizon Shortfall Scheme Appeals (HSSA): tariff of reasonable legal costs
items.summary: This guidance sets out the legal costs we will cover for Horizon Shortfall Scheme Appeals (HSSA) applicants.

items.title: Guidance: Horizon Convictions Redress Scheme (HCRS): privacy notice
items.summary: What data is collected when you apply for the Horizon Convictions Redress Scheme (HCRS) – how it's used, where it's stored, your rights.

items.title: Guidance: Summary of European Commission guidance on the EU CBAM for UK exporters
items.summary: This page is intended to help UK exporters of goods in scope of the EU Carbon Border Adjustment Mechanism (CBAM) to identify relevant EU guidance and information.

items.title: Industrial Strategy Advisory Council launches landmark partnership to accelerate UK innovation and growth
items.summary: The Industrial Strategy Advisory Council (ISAC) has partnered with the University of Manchester to access its research and expertise and drive forward recommendations for the Government’s Industrial Strategy.

items.title: Guidance: Overseas business risk for Belgium
items.summary: Information on key security and political risks which UK businesses may face when operating in Belgium.
